primary_purpose: set up AI Librarian for a project
execution_context: requires project directory with write access

project_path.validation: must be string, must be a directory, must have access

always_use_when: starting to work with a new project
need to track code components across conversations
want to enable code navigation features
never_use_when: don't have write access to project directory
working with simple scripts rather than project

common_error_patterns.meaning: No write access to project directory
Librarian already exists for this project

execution_examples.intent: Set up AI Librarian for a new project
execution_examples.follow_up: query components to understand the codebase
